ilog.opl

Class IloOplDataHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • ilog.opl.IloOplDataHandler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    IloOplDataSerializer

    public class IloOplDataHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Interface to provide OPL with data. This is the interface used by custom data source implementations. Refer also to the Interfaces User's Manual.
    See Also:
    ilog.opl.IloOplDataSourceBaseI
